task.title: Passing a SOQL Filter using a URL Parameter
task.abstract: Display data to the end user by passing a SOQL filter in the URL.

taskbody.context: Convert the SOQL query to a URL parameter.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Form Builder app and select the Form that requires editing.
Copy the Field Group id of the record(s) passed through the Form URL.
Append _SOQL= to the end of the id and define the SOQL filter.
Encode the SOQL query by navigating to http://meyerweb.com/eric/tools/dencoder/.
Append the encoded SOQL filter to the URL.
